cause.description:
This is a cause that is already up and running. I am just bringing awarness about it. Much Love Animal Rescue is an animal shelter in Los Angels California decated to finding homes for abused and neglected animals. It also helps with stray and animals that have not been adopted and are on "death row." It is a non-profit organisation. Check out the offical web page www.muchlove.org for more information
1. All animals should have homes.
2. Every animal should have a chance at life.
3. All animals should be loved.
cause.name: Much Love Animal Rescue
